title: Mr. Durian
overview: Su Chen, Mr. Durian, tough on the outside and soft on the inside, has been secretly in love with Yi Xiang Nuan for many years. One day he decides to confess to her, and suddenly she accepts his feelings. They live a happy and romantic life on campus, but one accident forces Yi Xiang Nuan to sever all ties with her boyfriend and leave for another country...On the first day of Yi Xiang Nuan's return to her hometown after three years of departure, she is forcibly taken away by her ex-boyfriend Su Chen, forcing her to marry him. He had been waiting for Yi Xiang Nuan's return for three years and had not heard any news about her during the wait, but time could not change his affection. And Xiang Nuan always thought that Su Chen married her to avenge her sudden departure...and Xiang Nuan starts working for her husband's company, becoming his subordinate. After spending time together, she discovered that Su Chen had retained feelings for her for many years. At the same time, he will also help Xiang Nuan find out the truth about her father's death...based on the comic
